full_text: @thayne_griffin From the public data available from the #nflverse, but you have to be able to code to access it. No place I know has the play by play for every down with EPA. But yes, the pbp does also have win probability added. I can check when I get back on my computer.

Here's the Chiefs offensive formations against the Jaguars. That is just a whole lotta nice there, folks. Successful in every way. Also, boy isn't it nice when JuJu gets to play the whole game, and Toney gets his touches?? 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/K30tZLSTBN

Here's our defense. As a down-payment on my atonement, I have finally fixed the Dunlap glitch. He is now in his rightful place as a DL, and all numbers now account for that switch. Jax got us when we had 6 DB's on the field. Probably garbage time up 10 stats.

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/oyYQUDNv3w

Here's Jacksonville's charts. Their offense was alright, but not good enough. Our offense beat every defensive formation they had like a drum except for their 1-5-5, whatever the hell THAT is. 6 snaps in that formation, and it worked! 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/Pii9I7SDXK
